column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR NEW CIRCLE RD:
column4: The outer loop is shut down between Old Frankfort Pike and Versailles Rd due to a large fuel spill.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR NEW CIRCLE RD:
column4: Police will be diverting traffic onto Old Frankfort Pike.  Motorists planning travel in this area should seek an alternate route.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR NEW CIRCLE RD:
column4: Motorists can expect increased congestion on Old Frankfort Pike and S Forbes Rd.
Inner loop New Circle Rd just prior to Leestown Rd.
